TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DragEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 、 或 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the , , or event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者完成拖放作業，將物件拖曳到控制項，然後再卸除它到該控制項所鬆開滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user completes a drag-and-drop operation by dragging an object over the control and then dropping it onto the control by releasing the mouse button. 使用者拖曳的物件，使用滑鼠時移動滑鼠指標拖曳至控制項時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer onto the control while dragging an object with the mouse. 使用者同時拖曳物件，以滑鼠將滑鼠指標移動控制項上方時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the control while dragging an object with the mouse. A物件會指定與此事件相關聯的任何資料; SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 鍵的目前狀態的滑鼠指標位置，以及來源和目標的拖曳事件所允許的拖放效果。A object specifies any data associated with this event; the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys; the location of the mouse pointer; and the drag-and-drop effects allowed by the source and target of the drag event. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)] 下列範例說明如何拖放作業的目標與來源之間傳遞。The following example illustrates how are passed between the source and target of a drag-and-drop operation. 在此範例中，控制項做為來源的資料，而控制項做為目標。In this example, a control is the source of the data, and the control is the target. 此範例假設控制項已填入有效的檔案名稱的清單。The example assumes that the control has been populated with a list of valid filenames. 當使用者拖曳其中一個從顯示的檔名控制項拖曳至控制項，檔名中參照的檔案會開啟。When the user drags one of the displayed filenames from the control onto the control, the file referenced in the filename is opened. 作業會以起始控制項 MouseDown 事件。The operation is initiated in the control's MouseDown event. 在 事件處理常式，此範例會使用方法來驗證資料的格式，控制項可以顯示，然後設定屬性來指定該資料應該複製從原始檔控制加入目標控制項。In the event handler, the example uses the method to verify that the data is in a format that the control can display and then sets the property to specify that data should be copied from the source control to the target control. 最後，控制項的拖放事件處理常式使用方法來擷取要開啟的檔案名稱。Finally, the control's DragDrop event handler uses the method to retrieve the filename to open. [!code-cpp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得原始 (或來源) 拖曳事件所允許的拖放作業。

span.span: Gets which drag-and-drop operations are allowed by the originator (or source) of the drag event.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項啟始拖放作業藉由呼叫方法，它會指定允許作業的效果。When a control initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the method, it specifies the permissible effects of the operation. 例如，當您將檔案從來源中，如果檔案是唯讀的 （或從唯讀的儲存媒體例如 CD），來源會指出，即可複製檔案，但不是能轉移到目標。For example, when you drag a file from a source, if the file is read-only (or from a read-only storage medium such as a CD), the source will indicate that the file can be copied, but not transferred, to the target. 然後再嘗試所拖曳的資料上執行作業，您應該檢查這個屬性，以確保允許的作業。Before attempting to perform an operation on the dragged data, you should examine this property to ensure that the operation is allowed. ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在您的事件處理常式的主體中，您可以使用方法，以判斷資料是否符合格式需求的資料被拖曳至其上的控制項。In the body of your event handler, you can use the method to determine whether the data matches the format requirements of the control onto which the data is being dragged. 您也可以指定是否要嘗試將資料轉換成符合您格式的需求。You also can specify whether you want to attempt to convert the data to meet your format requirements. 如果拖曳的資料符合格式需求，使用方法來擷取資料。If the dragged data meets your format requirements, use the method to retrieve the data. ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得或設定拖放作業中的目標置放效果。

span.span: Gets or sets the target drop effect in a drag-and-drop operation.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，套用的效果會決定滑鼠游標拖放作業的目標。By default, the effect applied determines the mouse cursor for the target of a drag-and-drop operation. 這是要提供意見反應給使用者，就會發生的作業上很有用。This is useful to provide feedback to the user on the operation that will occur. 例如，如果當您將檔案拖曳來源，您可以按 CTRL 鍵，指定表示目標將會嘗試執行複製作業。For example, if you press the CTRL key when you drag a file from a source, specify to indicate the target will try to perform a copy operation. 若要使用自訂的資料指標在拖曳作業，請參閱。To use custom cursors for a drag operation, see . ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyState As Integer
public: property int KeyState { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 SHIFT、CTRL 和 ALT 鍵的目前狀態，以及滑鼠按鍵的狀態。

span.span: Gets the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons.

value.span: SHIFT、CTRL 和 ALT 鍵和滑鼠按鍵的目前狀態。

span.span: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys and of the mouse buttons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以進行特定索引鍵的狀態而定的拖放作業的效果。You can make the effect of a drag-and-drop operation to depend on the state of a particular key. 例如，您可能決定要複製或移動資料，根據拖放作業期間是否按下 CTRL 或 SHIFT 鍵。For example, you may decide to copy or move data depending on whether the CTRL or SHIFT keys are pressed during the drag-and-drop operation. 中所設定的位元屬性識別的索引鍵或在作業期間按下的滑鼠按鈕。The bits that are set in the property identify the keys or mouse buttons that were pressed during the operation. 例如，如果按下滑鼠左的按鈕時，第一個位元屬性設定。For example, if the left mouse button is pressed, the first bit in the property is set. 您可以使用位元的 AND 運算子來測試指定的按鍵狀態。You can use the bitwise AND operator to test for a given key state. 下表列出用於指定事件的值。The following table lists the values that are used for a specified event. |值Value|KeyKey| |-----------|---------| |1 (bit 0)1 (bit 0)|滑鼠左鍵。The left mouse button.| |2 （1 位元）2 (bit 1)|滑鼠右鍵。The right mouse button.| |4 （2 位元）4 (bit 2)|SHIFT 鍵。The SHIFT key.| |8 （位元 3）8 (bit 3)|CTRL 鍵。The CTRL key.| |16 （位元 4）16 (bit 4)|滑鼠中鍵。The middle mouse button.| |32 （位元 5）32 (bit 5)|ALT 鍵。The ALT key.| ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property X As Integer
public: property int X { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得滑鼠指標的 X 座標 (在螢幕座標中)。

span.span: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse pointer, in screen coordinates.

value.span: 滑鼠指標的 X 座標 (單位為像素)。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer in pixels.
